byline.contributor: Rukmini Callimachi and Milan Schreuer contributed reporting.
byline.original: By ANDREW HIGGINS and KIMIKO DE FREYTAS-TAMURA

abstract: Abdelhamid Abaaoud, suspected mastermind in Paris terror attacks, was hunted in major operation by security officials before attacks; Islamic State fighter's family in Belgium wished him dead.
lead_paragraph: The family of Abdelhamid Abaaoud, who is believed to have organized the attacks on Paris, hoped he had died fighting for the Islamic State in Syria.

headline.main: An ISIS Militant From Belgium Whose Own Family Wanted Him Dead
headline.print_headline: An ISIS Fighter With Family in Belgium Who Wanted Him Dead

snippet: The family of Abdelhamid Abaaoud, who is believed to have organized the attacks on Paris, hoped he had died fighting for the Islamic State in Syria.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
